abstract: Lions Gate shareholders voted on Wednesday to keep the film studio’s poison-pill plan intact, though a Canadian appeals court has already upheld an order ruling it invalid.
snippet: Lions Gate shareholders voted on Wednesday to keep the film studio’s poison-pill plan intact, though a Canadian appeals court has already upheld an order ruling it invalid.
lead_paragraph: Score one for Lions Gate Entertainment in its battle with the investor Carl C. Icahn — though how big a victory it is remains to be seen.

headline.main: Lions Gate Shareholders Vote to Keep Poison Pill
